name: Populate searching fields according to a selected discipline option

testSteps.description: Populate searching fields according to a selected discipline option #1: {discipline=Testing, Line Manager=Andrés Calle, Career Coach=Gina Acosta, Buddy=Andrés Rincón}

children.description: Given I am already logged using email: "admin@endava.com" and password "admin"
And i am on the create joiner interface
Then the fields: "Andrés Calle", "Gina Acosta" and "Andrés Rincón"have to be auto-populated with the belonged default value

testSteps.description: Populate searching fields according to a selected discipline option #2: {discipline=PDR, Line Manager=Felipe Vila, Career Coach=Raúl Fandino, Buddy=Germán Valencia}

children.description: Given I am already logged using email: "admin@endava.com" and password "admin"
And i am on the create joiner interface
Then the fields: "Felipe Vila", "Raúl Fandino" and "Germán Valencia"have to be auto-populated with the belonged default value

testSteps.description: Populate searching fields according to a selected discipline option #3: {discipline=Project management, Line Manager=Luz Fernández, Career Coach=Angy Muñoz, Buddy=Víctor Mejía}

children.description: Given I am already logged using email: "admin@endava.com" and password "admin"
And i am on the create joiner interface
Then the fields: "Luz Fernández", "Angy Muñoz" and "Víctor Mejía"have to be auto-populated with the belonged default value

userStory.narrative:
I want to select an option on the following auto-populated fields at the creation joiner moment
  So that I am able to enter consistent information in those fields

title: Populate searching fields according to a selected discipline option

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When I select one "<discipline>"
Then the fields: "<Line Manager>", "<Career Coach>" and "<Buddy>"have to be auto-populated with the belonged default value
